component.name: KEGGPathway
component.doc: Draws pathway diagrams of canonical KEGG pathways with up- and down-regulated genes highlighted in red and blue, respectively. The component can be operated in two modes. In enrichment mode, the component first identifies enriched pathways in the input genes and then draws diagrams for the top N enriched pathways. In drawing mode, the component just draws pathway diagrams for the specified KEGG pathways, i.e. not performing enrichment.
component.author: Christian Frech

input.name: degs
input.doc: List of input genes with fold-changes. The first column is supposed to contain Ensembl gene IDs, which internally are converted to Entrez gene ids for pathway mapping.

output.name: pathways
output.doc: CSV file with KEGG pathways and their enrichment.

output.name: document
output.doc: Latex report containing pathway diagrams Differentially expressed genes.

parameter.name: fdrCutoff
parameter.doc: FDR cut-off to consider a pathway significantly enriched.

parameter.name: topN
parameter.doc: Plot diagrams for top-N most enriched pathways. Others will be skipped.

parameter.name: caption
parameter.doc: This caption is prefixed with the pathway name and suffixed with enrichment details and legend details.
